name: RDash
long_description: RDash is a new age construction management platform for Developers, contractors and design studios. It enables complete workflow automation for design, projects, procurement, and finance professionals involved in construction and interior projects management.
one_liner: New Age ERP for interior and construction business

name: Draftaid
long_description:
DraftAid is the world's first generative AI for CAD manufacturing drawings, akin to GitHub Copilot but for CAD. It drastically shortens drawing creation time, turning hours into seconds.

Every product that is manufactured - from construction to aerospace, automotive, durable goods, and electronicsâ€”relies on drawings. Currently, engineers and designers painstakingly make these essential drawings manually. Draftaid streamlines this process saving teams millions in time and quality. 

The idea was born out of Abdullah's experience as a mechanical design team member, where he created thousands of drawings and longed for a more efficient process. Partnering with Tahsin, a neighbour with a PhD in AI, and Mohammed, a seasoned engineering VP with experience in construction software, they turned the dream into reality.

Since their launch in August, DraftAid has engaged customers through targeted outreach and word-of-mouth, securing paid pilots with subsequent contracts valued at $150,000.

Be a part of ushering in the new era of CAD designs!
one_liner: Go from 3D models to CAD drawings using AI

name: Structured AI
long_description: Structured AI builds AI-powered tools to automate repetitive workflows and make collaboration between different pre-construction engineering teams seamless.
one_liner: AI co-pilot for pre-construction design engineering

name: Articulate
long_description:
We provide a command center for construction and solar contractors. Our platform eliminates costly delays, confusion, and rework by automating procurement, centralizing communication, and auditing every design before construction starts for design discrepancies and code and spec compliance. From RFIs to permits to supplier follow-ups, everything is handled automatically so teams can focus on building, not waiting.

Project managers, superintendents, estimators, and construction managers use our platform to catch design discrepancies early, get proactive updates from every crew, and ensure on-time delivery from suppliers across every project. Articulate integrates seamlessly with Procore, Outlook, Gmail, Bluebeam, Autodesk, and other tools you already use, so there is no disruption to your workflow.

Teams use us to:
- Eliminate delays from drawing errors and change orders
- Reduce material wait times and procurement bottlenecks
- Get daily site updates through voice, text, and email agents
- Instantly verify local code and permit requirements
- Save $3M per project through intelligent automation

Contact founders@usearticulate.com to schedule a call!
